items.title: Sequence 9: Savant
items.text:
New Abilities
Knowledge (Mysticism and Mechanics): Savants believe that knowledge is power and through drinking the potion, they gain new information about mysticism and mechanics.
They have a rough understanding of the mysticism, but are more knowledgeable about the formation and use of aqua regia, nitroglycerin, and other complicated bolts and gears.
To an average person, they appear to know everything.
Recall (Memory): This is the core ability of a Savant. With it, they can recall every single piece of knowledge and experience they have ever seen.
At the same time, they also possess increased learning and comprehension skills.

items.title: Sequence 8: Archaeologist
items.text:
New Abilities
Physical Enhancements: Archaeologists possess a strong enough body and adaptable ability to face everything they may come across in their explorations.
Strengthened Abilities

Knowledge (History, Survival, Mysticism): Archaeologists possess a good deal of knowledge about history and outdoor survival, as well as knowledge of taboos and mysticism about ruins.
Ritualistic Magic: Besides that, Archaeologists will also gain knowledge that allows them to learn and cast some basic Ritualistic Magic.

items.title: Sequence 7: Appraiser
items.text:
New Abilities
Appraisal: Appraisers can intuitively understand the powers and problems of most extraordinary items and can use them while keeping the danger to the minimum.
If the target item contains a higher status than their Sequence, or they lack certain knowledge of by Recall, their Appraisal will be incomplete or misunderstood.

items.title: Sequence 6: Artisan (Machinery Specialist)
items.text:
New Abilities
Craftsmanship: Artisans are the true masters of Craftsmanship both in the ordinary and mystical world, the extraordinary items that they create and accumulate, along with their capabilities as an Appraiser, allows them to reach the strength of a Sequence 5.
By using Beyonder Characteristics or the main ingredients for potions, Artisans are able to craft Sealed Artifacts which have more powerful effects than normal while also possessing less negative and severe side effects than naturally formed or created Sealed Artifacts.
The negative effects of the corresponding Sealed Artifacts depend on both the Sequence level of the Artisan and the Sealed Artifacts' uniqueness themselves.
By using items with Spirituality, they can produce enchanted Beyonder weapons such as axes, guns and bullets, cannons and cannonballs, bombs, etc. or worn Mystical Items such as belts, brooches, rings, etc. with Beyonder effects but have a limited lifespan.
As such, they can directly fix the summoning rituals of Spirit World creatures like Messengers unto an item to make it more convenient.
They can produce mechanical wonders and when it comes to Craftsmanship, they are more versed in this aspect compared to creating extraordinary items.
Strengthened Abilities
Knowledge (Mysticism): Their abilities with Ritualistic Magic are enhanced.

items.title: Sequence 5: Astronomer (Astromancer)
items.text:
New Abilities
They gain Beyonder powers that can be used in combat.

items.title: Sequence 4: Alchemist
items.text:
New Abilities
Artificial Life Creation: They can inject Souls and life into items they create and form life.
As for the way an Alchemist is able to obtain life force, it is through extracting the life force out of other living beings within a certain range that increases with digestion.
The injected Souls that an Alchemist uses come from fragments of spirits from the Spirit World, which is extracted from the surrounding lifeforms around them.
Beam of Disintegration: They can emit a beam of light capable of destroying the structures of most objects, thoroughly Disintegrating the target.
Strengthened Abilities
Craftsmanship: Their ability of Craftsmanship has been greatly enhanced. Be it in through mystical or physical means, they can create true mechanical and supernatural marvels.
They can create a machine that looks indistinguishable from humans via injecting it with a Soul, giving it the ability to move, talk, and behave just like a human.
The specialty of a Ancient Alchemist can just barely be emulated to create different golems and human beings using incomplete spirits and various metals.
They can make a mechanical body that has powerful mechanical tools installed inside their bodies such as a cannon, or a device that allows Flight.
Recall: Their Recall ability has been drastically enhanced. Now they can extract environmental information and work backwards to deduce what has happened.
Mythical Creature Form
As Demigods at Sequence 4 who have obtained partial Godhood, they are able to manifest their incomplete Mythical Creature Form if they disregard any of the consequences.

items.title: Sequence 3: Arcane Scholar (Demon of Arcana)
items.text:
Strengthened Abilities

Craftsmanship: Arcane Scholars possess extraordinary manufacturing abilities, being able to create mystical items, complex mechanical devices, or combine the two together.
Appraisal: Arcane Scholars are able to quickly grasp the relevant information when using Mystical Items, effectively avoiding its negative effects completely.
Artificial Life Creation: An Arcane Scholar is able to extract the life force of surrounding living beings within a five-kilometer radius.
Mythical Creature Form

As a Sequence 3 Beyonder, they can respond to prayers within a certain range.

items.title: Sequence 2: Knowledge Magister (Master)
items.text:
New Abilities

Fog Transformation: "They" can take the form of a pale white fog.
Authorities

Physics: Being Angels of the Paragon Pathway, "They" possess the ability to see the essence of things and are able to change the laws of Physics in an area to a certain extent.
Mythical Creature Form

"They" have become a full Mythical Creature.

items.title: Sequence 1: Illuminator (Civilization Enlightener, Light of Darkness)
items.text:
Authorities
Technology: "They" lead the development of civilization.
Fragment of Civilization: "They" can reveal picture-like projections that record the heavy history of humanity and the development of civilization to protect against attacks, this is especially useful to contain the Knowledge Injection of a Knowledge Emperor.
Revolutionary Innovation: "They" can create futuristic wonders beyond the scope of current world-era technologies such as nuclear fusion-based technology or giant mechanical robots (such as the ones in Gundam) with just a simple gesture.

items.title: Sequence 0: Paragon
items.text:
Authorities
Essence: "They" possess the Essence authority, which also includes atoms.
"They" can turn others into knowledge, information, and words, and imprint them into an illusory book, trapping those things which "They" can use for many different matters.
"They" can release a blurry light that seeps out from the void and envelopes the surroundings, which has the effect of restoring the most basic structure of various things.
"They" can release an unclear ray composed of innumerable illusive things that can reduce anything into the most basic structure of all things that it envelops.
"They" can make videos, photos, novels, or messages collapse into pure snow-like static, effectively destroying the Information structure it holds.
This will rapidly spread forming a huge Information Vortex. Not only is this an effective way to interfere with general Information, it also can be used to destroy the origin of those Information or deal with the Information abilities of the Hermit Pathway.
Technology: "They" have mastered the authority of Technology.
"They" can make advanced programs and effects that carry within it "Their" Beyonder abilities and authorities that can then be bestowed onto everyday electronic devices like phones. 
Franca used the Information Shredder to destroy all image of a painting created by Luo Shan. This in the end resulted in the destruction of the original painting.
With various help and assistance, the Information Shredder created by the God of Steam and Machinery was used to kill off the Hidden Sage.
